name: Infernoble Knight - Astolfo
text: You can banish 1 FIRE Warrior monster from your hand or GY; Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can make it become the same Level as that banished monster. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon this banished card during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation, then you can Special Summon 1 of your FIRE Warrior monsters that is banished or in your GY. You can only use each effect of "Infernoble Knight - Astolfo" once per Duel.
